ProductInfo.Features:
Set D1, Half D1, CIF Real-time Recording and Playback / Set different Frame Per Second on each channel
The desired recording quality can be managed through intuitive screen. The recording time availability will be varied based on the recording resolution settings and the HDD capacity
DVR Motion detection triggered events can be promptly notified by loud audible alert and / or Email notifications to PCs or smart phones
Configurable per channel, Surveillance Signal Loss, Motion Trigger, Audible Alarm, Alert Durations, Recording Log Management
Live view and access control through Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, and Mac OSX/safari. Streaming live video on mobile smart phones or tablets via free app.
ProductInfo.Name: Aposonic A-S1602R25 16-Channel H.264 Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Standalone DVR, Mac Ready
